alert.note: Alert for Benton; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 21 at 12:17AM CDT until May 21 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Benton County in northwestern Arkansas... Northern Washington County in northwestern Arkansas... * Until 115 AM CDT. * At 1217 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Siloam Springs, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Springdale... Rogers... Bentonville... Siloam Springs... Lowell... Gentry... Tontitown... Cave Springs... Highfill... Springtown... Northwest Arkansas Regional Air... Cincinnati... Centerton... Johnson... Elm Springs... Goshen... Savoy... Wedington... Gallitin... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 64 and 89. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
